name: BeamNG.drive
description: A dynamic soft-body physics vehicle simulator capable of doing just about anything.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 Processor: Desktop Intel i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 550 TI DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64 Bit Processor: High-end Intel i5/i7 or High-end AMD 6 Core or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 780 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: Gamepad recommended
